column4: Ok, interesting problem... my intel card's direct rendering isnt playing nice with composite
When a window uses 3d direct rendering, the render covers all windows that should be above it
known issue with intel 915 or whatever it is... no work-around, it's blacklisted because the card won't function correctly with compiz.
i have 945, not blacklisted and doesnt play nice. only messes up on direct render
